ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Schaffenberger,Pete Costanza,Steve Ditko,Paul Reinman,Pete Costanza,Steve Ditko,Paul Reinman
ComicInfo.Title: Operation: Viet Nam!; You'll Know No Rest!; My Son the Creature!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Operation: Viet Nam!: Dragonia escapes from prison and tries to win Chairman Mao's favor by fighting against American troops in Viet Name with her magic, so Magicman and Kilkenny travel there to stop her.
You'll Know No Rest!: A sea captain is cursed to wander the world unable to remember who he is or where he is from.
My Son the Creature!: Phineas Trimble builds an android that he passes off as his adult son, but they argue after the android falls in love with a girl and Trimble accidentally destroys his creation.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Kurato Osaki,Shane O'Shea,Zev Zimmer,Kurato Osaki,Shane O'Shea
